ResourceHeader.ResourceName: SOlar Diameter Imager and Surface Mapper (SODISM)
ResourceHeader.Description: The Solar Diameter Imager and Surface Mapper (SODISM) is an 11-cm diameter telescope on board the PICARD space mission. It measures the solar irradiation and provides wide-field images of the photosphere and chromosphere of the Sun in five narrow pass bands (centered at 215.0, 393.37, 535.7, 607.1, and 782.2 nm).
